pages.name: Architect's Belt
pages.text: $(li)Architect's Belt increases your reach distance when you place or break blocks.$(br)$(li)This effect can be upgraded by placing blocks until the item levels up.$(br)$(li)It can only be traded by the Mason, Ceramist and Carpenter villagers.

$(l)Reach Distance Levels$()$(br)$(li)Level 1 Reach Distance +1$(br)   0/100 - Blocks Placed$(br)$(li)Level 2 Reach Distance +2$(br)   100/500 - Blocks Placed$(br)$(li)Level 3 Reach Distance +3$(br)   500/1000 - Blocks Placed$(br)$(li)Level 4 Reach Distance +4$(br)   1000/2500 - Blocks Placed$(br)$(li)Level 5 Reach Distance +5$(br)   2500/2500 - Blocks Placed
